text: Jesse John Bochco (born March 2, 1975) is an American television director and producer. He is the son television producer Steven Bochco and actress Barbara Bosson. In 2009, Bochco married actress Kate Danson, the daughter of actor Ted Danson and his second wife Cassandra Coates. They divorced in 2015. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:American television directors Category:American television producers Category:People from Los Angeles
title: Jesse Bochco
